Question: Neuranics Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Neuranics Limited

Product: Wearable Magnetocardiography (MCG) Development Platform

- Neuranics develops pioneering magnetic sensor technology for health, fitness, and metaverse sectors
- The MCG sensors have a single point of contact on the body, or through thin clothing, which will replace existing 3-lead electrocardiography (ECG) sensors for sports fitness and medical monitoring devices
- The development kit includes the latest Neuranics magnetic sensor, prototype electronics, Bluetooth interface, software for analysis on a laptop, and an app for Android mobile phones and tablets
- The kit will be available for purchase in early 2024 and will come with consultation and technical support
